name: Possession (itch) (flowermute, Tcikva, LHA2401, KarolWes)
description:
What can be worse than being dead and cursed? Is to have an opportunity to be resurrected, but only if your beloved one will remember you. As a ghost, you are able to possess other people in order to move forward and collect memorable objects from your shared past, which can help your love to remember you. But possession is not a harmless thing, every action have consequences, and you can have a second chance, but at what cost...  

Controls:

Move : A/D or arrows

Jump: Space bar or W

Possess/Release: R

Interact: E (You need to be a human to interact with the environment)

By: Karol Wesolowski, Nadzeya Dziamidchyk, Lukas Adlassnig and Andrii Pavlin
